Title: Relates to expanding the requirements for dealer exemption from the vehicle electronic reassignment and integrated facility inventory system
Summary: Relates to expanding the requirements for dealer exemption from the vehicle electronic reassignment and integrated facility inventory system to include dealers that sell less than one hundred vehicles per year.
LawCode: Add ยง200-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to expanding the requirements for dealer exemption from the vehicle electronic reassignment and integrated facility inventory system
